artist: Artist: After Gerard ter Borch; Draftsman: Claude Francois Girod-Lambert; Etcher: Jean Nicolas Lerouge; Engraver: Antoine Claude François Villerey
description: officer seated at table holding a letter, with woman seated on floor at his side leaning on him; messemger standing before them awaiting orders
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet black: No. 621 G.TERBURG  Ecole Flam. de. / Des é par Girod  Grave a la Eau-forte par Lerouge  Ter\'e par Villerey / UN TROMPETTE ATTENDANT DES ORERES  | on sheet in pencil: 2-461
portfolio: From Gallerie du Musee de Napoleon, plate 621
title: The Messenger / The Unwelcome Call
